description: Martin strategy configuration with safety limits to prevent liquidation
notes: max_volume: Maximum allowed volume per trade
loss_threshold: Loss percentage to trigger martingale (%)
hard_stop_loss: Hard stop loss percentage (%) - forces close
max_drawdown: Maximum drawdown from peak (%) - forces close
account_balance: Account balance for position size calculation
max_position_pct: Max position as percentage of balance (0.3 = 30%)
cooldown_after_losses: Enter cooldown after N consecutive losses
